basics.name: Kayla Yanos
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

highlights: Work independently/in group setting to complete projects with minimum supervision
Ability to recognize problems, identify possible causes, and resolve issues that commonly arises in customer/student/administrative services
Assist students at the front desk: answer questions and make appropriate referrals to campus offices and advising units, schedule appointments via phone or in person
Clerical work: filing, photocopying, updating evaluation database.

activities.organization: Supporting Women in Information Technology Hawaii (SWITCH)
highlights: Handle and manage funds related to club events
Create and present budget for club events

awards.title: Deans List
awards.summary: Maintained a GPA of 3.5 or higher.
